description: Whether you're scrambling desert slick rock on a dayhike or traversing high ridges in the midst of a week-long backcountry traverse, our rugged Stryder™ Belted Short is a tough, trail-specific short ready for the mission at hand. The Stryder's ultra-durable nylon fabric not only dries super fast and features a weather-shedding DWR finish, but it's 100% recycled to lighten your impact on the planet you love to explore. The integrated and removable belt ensures a quick and perfect fit.
name: Mountain Hardwear Stryder Belted Shorts - Mens
